boat.full_description:
Calypso was winner of the Bermudan section of OGA Solent 50th celebrations in 2013.

She is a beautiful 18' Bermudan cutter, 3/4 rig. Built by Ponsharden Shipyard, Falmouth in the 1930s, reputedly to a design by Warrington Smyth.

Carvel construction, pitch pine on oak, copper fastened, lead keel.

Her draft is 4'2" and she sails like a dream. 

Whilst the accommodation is perhaps limited for extended cruising, she has two berths (one settee, one comfortable pipe cot - both 6 foot) and has carried her owners safely over many cruises between Weymouth and Eastbourne.
boat.name: Calypso

ownerships.note: Owner prior to 1991 was Keith Hathaway

boat.short_description: 'Calypso' is a beautiful Bermudan cutter, built Falmouth in the 1930s.
